title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V1\WordInfo
name: WordInfo
description:
Word-specific information for recognized words.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v1.WordInfo

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.start_time
params.description: Time offset relative to the beginning of the audio, and corresponding to the start of the spoken word. This field is only set if enable_word_time_offsets=true and only in the top hypothesis. This is an experimental feature and the accuracy of the time offset can vary.

params.name: data.end_time
params.description: Time offset relative to the beginning of the audio, and corresponding to the end of the spoken word. This field is only set if enable_word_time_offsets=true and only in the top hypothesis. This is an experimental feature and the accuracy of the time offset can vary.

params.name: data.word
params.description: The word corresponding to this set of information.

params.name: data.speaker_tag
params.description: A distinct integer value is assigned for every speaker within the audio. This field specifies which one of those speakers was detected to have spoken this word. Value ranges from '1' to diarization_speaker_count. speaker_tag is set if enable_speaker_diarization = 'true' and only in the top alternative.

methods.name: getStartTime
methods.description:
Time offset relative to the beginning of the audio, and corresponding to the start of the spoken word.

This field is only set if enable_word_time_offsets=true and only in the top hypothesis. This is an experimental feature and the accuracy of the time offset can vary.

speaker_tag is set if enable_speaker_diarization = 'true' and only in the top alternative.
